original_title: 実録！呪われた心霊体験３ 怨霊激撮100連発!!
overview: The third installment of a realistic horror collection that includes haunted spot introductions, posted photos, and reproduction dramas. Suzuki, who received a chain mail and a "memory card of death", is attacked by an inexplicable phenomenon and goes missing...
title: True record! Cursed psychic experience 3: 100 shots of vengeful ghosts!!
